name: My Pet Kingdom
description:
My Pet Kingdom is a tiny kingdom simulator! Start with nothing and build up your town, using the resources to build or upgrade your structures.

Originally designed for the 2016 #Lowrezjam, this version has improved art, sound, music, a save/load system, and new resources and structures to discover!

How To Play

  • Collect water and acorns to plant more trees or develop wheat fields on fertile ground.
  • Use wheat to build homes for your peasants; build their homes close to trees to collect lumber.
  • Upgrade peasant houses near stone with lumber to allow them to begin harvesting stone.
  • See if you can build a tower, church, and road!

For more information about how the game was developed, as well as access to other digital goodies, you can follow me at my Patreon page: https://www.patreon.com/tomirony! Or you can follow me on Twitter!

Music

All music was done by the incredibly talented Zephyr Nova. Check out his stuff at https://soundcloud.com/zephyr-nova and https://zephyrnova.bandcamp.com/releases.

Title Art & Quality Assurance

Title art and quality assurance both done by the indelible Eliezer Martin (https://ectopicfantast.wordpress.com/).
